comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: How could have American men been so stupid to keep women from voting until 1919?  Unbelievable.  We had human beings as SLAVES until Lincoln's time, and we had women unable to vote until 1919, and some places in the South would not let Blacks vote until the 1950's

comment.author: 16002099@N00
comment._content:
And why did women /allow/ this to continue? 

You go grls! Kick ass! (No black women in the marchers, you can be sure).

comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: I am a male, but I wish they would have made a law that every other election would have women candidates only.  Perhaps we would have gotten into fewer wars.
